ESRI.Configuration.Name: Automated Projection Selection
ESRI.Configuration.Description: Addin to enable projection selection for GIS projects.
ESRI.Configuration.Author: Paul Gosling

ComboBox.caption: Project Name
ComboBox.message: Type text for project name (max 10 characters)
ComboBox.tip: Add name to identify output files

Help.heading: Add name to identify output files

ComboBox.Help: Type text for project name (max 10 characters)

ComboBox.caption: Purpose
ComboBox.message: Select from the drop-down list of purposes
ComboBox.tip: Select the appropriate purpose for the GIS project or output

Help.heading: Select the appropriate purpose for the GIS project or output

ComboBox.Help: Select from the drop-down list of purposes

ComboBox.caption: Input Dataset
ComboBox.message: Select from drop-down list of appropriate layers in active data frame. Appropriate data type depends on Purpose and data must be referenced to Geographic Coordinate System
ComboBox.tip: Select input dataset which defines area of interest

Help.heading: Select input dataset which defines area of interest

ComboBox.Help: Select from drop-down list of appropriate layers in active data frame. Appropriate data type depends on Purpose and data must be referenced to Geographic Coordinate System

Button.caption: Run Tool
Button.message: Tool runs using the selected inputs. See messages for outputs generated
Button.tip: Run the automated projection selection process using input selections

Help.heading: Run the automated projection selection process using input selections

Button.Help: Tool runs using the selected inputs. See messages for outputs generated

ComboBox.caption: Projected Coord System
ComboBox.message: Select from drop-down list of candidate options created by selection tool. See messages and results text file for option rankings
ComboBox.tip: Select the desired Projected Coordinate System

Help.heading: Select the desired Projected Coordinate System

ComboBox.Help: Select from drop-down list of candidate options created by selection tool. See messages and results text file for option rankings

Button.caption: Apply
Button.message: Set data frame coordinate system property using selection from drop-down list
Button.Help: Set data frame coordinate system property using selection from drop-down list

Button.caption: Reset
Button.message: Remove selections and allow user to start afresh
Button.tip: Reset all previous input field selections

Help.heading: Reset all previous input field selections

Button.Help: Remove selections and allow user to start afresh
